ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will leave them as a barren, level plain
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And turn them into a level plain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and leave the earth a levelled plain
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and leave them so smoothly levelled
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore leaving the earth just as an empty plain.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then He shall leave it as a level smooth plain."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then leave it a plain, smooth level
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then He will leave them a level hollow
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And leave it as an empty plain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and leave the earth level and bare,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then He shall leave it a plain, level.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then He will leave it a level plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will leave them as plains smooth and level;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then He shall leave it as a level smooth plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and leave them a desolate waste,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He will leave the earth a level plain;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:106] then He will leave them a level hollow, a flattened [level] surface,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And leave it) and leave the earth (as an empty plain) without vegetation,
